articles.Title: Big Data on vehicles plus a open platform IoT analytic apps
articles.Description: Mojio offers a device that plugs into the On Board Diagnostic II (ODB) connector and includes GPS and an accelerometer. It sends vehicle performance and location data to Mojio’s platform via AT&T’s 3G network in the US and the Telus network in Canada and provides APIs for applications to use. This is Big Data on vehicle performance meets the Internet of Things via an open platform with open APIs.

articles.Title: Big Data Now Mainstream In Large Companies, Term Still Widely Disliked, A New Survey Finds
articles.Description: For the third year in a row, NewVantage Partners has conducted a survey of Fortune 1000 senior business and technology executives regarding their companies’ investments in big data. Big data has gone mainstream with 67% of executives reporting that they have big data initiatives running in production.
